languages.text: This weapon has an additional extremely short-range {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} (2 cells) and increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (50%).

languages.text: Diese Waffe verfügt über eine zusätzliche, extreme Kurzstrecken-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} (2 Felder) und erhöhten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} (50 %).

languages.text: Bu silah, son derece kısa menzilli (2 hücre) ek bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyete{/g} sahiptir ve verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} %50 artar.
